params.description: The value of the new stop. Use rgbEx/rgba expressions for color gradients.

actions.name: Create permutation table
actions.description: Creates a sequence of numbers that are randomly ordered.
actions.display_text: Create permutation with {0} values starting at {1}

params.name: Length
params.description: The length of the new permutation table.

params.name: Offset
params.description: The lowest value in the table.

params.name: Name
params.description: The name of the probability table

params.name: Entry weight
params.description: The weight for the probability of the value

params.name: Name

actions.description: Remove an entry from the current probability table that matches a given weight and value

params.name: Entry weight
params.description: The weight for the probability of the value, specifying 0 matches any weight
